ActivityMetadata.Name: PD List business services
ActivityMetadata.Label: PD List business services
ActivityMetadata.Description:
List existing business services.
Business services model capabilities that span multiple technical services and that may be owned by several different teams.
For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#business-services)
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# PagerDuty

List business services

List existing business services. Business services model capabilities that span multiple technical services and that may be owned by several different teams. For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#business-services)

Method: Get

OperationID: listBusinessServices

EndPoint:

/business_services
